title: ZK-Dissent Payload
description: Example payload for Zero-Knowledge Dissent stored in Vault-Kit.

dissent_id.description: Unique identifier for the dissent, matching DMS DISSENT object.

author_pseudonym.description: Pseudonymous identifier for the dissenter (optional, for internal tracking).

claim.description: The full text of the dissent claim.
claim.example: I believe the proposed timeline underestimates integration risk by 50%.

example: Prior project X took 6 weeks, not 3.
Email from vendor dated 2026-01-15 confirming dependency delay.

conditions_to_change_mind.description: What would cause the dissenter to withdraw or modify their dissent.
conditions_to_change_mind.example: If integration completes within 3 weeks as planned.

roles.description: Roles authorized to access the full content.

access_policy.description: Access control policy for the vault content.
